name: Dungeon Stacker
description:
This is a simple game that helped me learn the Defold engine. I don't plan on ever updating it, nevertheless feedback is always appreciated.

Credits
  • @y444 — code and design
  • Font End Dev — Alkhemikal font licensed under CC BY 4.0
  • @pixel_poem — 2D Pixel Dungeon Asset Pack
  • @increpare — Bfxr for sound effects
  • @davidcapello — Aseprite for sprite editing
  • All my friends who reluctantly tested the game — invaluable feedback
